step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists closer together for better form.
You're raising your hands well. Focus on keeping your elbows closer to your head as you bring them up.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a key part of the stretch.
You held the position effectively. Ensure your head stays upright and avoid leaning forward.
Returning to the start position looks good. Keep up the controlled movement.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your wrists together when clasping your hands and focus on spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This helps improve shoulder flexibility and lymph flow.
